subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In Tim Lincecum, the 5-foot-11, 163-pound dervish with two Cy Young Awards before his 26th birthday, the Giants have a refreshing antidote to a messy recent past.
snippet: In Tim Lincecum, the 5-foot-11, 163-pound dervish with two Cy Young Awards before his 26th birthday, the Giants have a refreshing antidote to a messy recent past.
